turnstile.heading: Verify You're Human
turnstile.description: Please complete the verification below to continue

blocked_waf.heading: Request Blocked
blocked_waf.description: Our security system blocked this request
blocked_waf.what_to_do: If you believe this is an error, please contact support

blocked_geo.heading: Access Unavailable
blocked_geo.description: This service is not available in your region
blocked_geo.details: Due to compliance requirements, access is limited to certain geographic areas
blocked_geo.support: For questions about access restrictions, please contact support

ratelimit.heading: Too Many Requests
ratelimit.description: You've made too many requests. Please wait before trying again.

tips.title: What can I do?
tips.wait: Wait for the timer to finish

error.heading: Something Went Wrong
error.description: We're experiencing technical difficulties. Please try again.

network.action: Check your internet connection and try again

unsupported.action: Enable JavaScript or use a modern browser

unknown.action: Please try again or contact support
